item.title: Logistic Regression in R
item.description: # Load require library library(ISLR) library(plyr) library(tidyverse) # data manipulation and visualization library(modelr) # provides easy pipeline modeling functions library(broom) # helps to tidy up model outputs library(ROCR) # ROC curve and AUC library(kableExtra) # generating tables in HTML format Read in Data # Load data default <- as_tibble(ISLR::Default) default student balance income No No 729.
